problem_text_cn: 如图,在矩形ABCD中,AB=6,BC=8,点E在对角线BD上,且BE=6,连接AE并延长交DC于点F,则CF等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the rectangle ABCD, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, point E is on the diagonal BD, and BE = N_2, connect AE and extend the intersection DC at point F, then CF is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是矩形,∴∠BAD=90°,又AB=CD=6,BC=AD=8,∴BD=√{AB²+AD²}=10,∵BE=6,∴DE=10-6=4,∵AB∥CD,∴\frac{DF}{AB}=\frac{DE}{BE},即\frac{DF}{6}=\frac{4}{6},解得,DF=4,则CF=CD-DF=6-4=2,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是矩形的性质、相似三角形的判定和性质,掌握矩形的性质定理和相似三角形的判定定理、性质定理是解题的关键．
